Philip Polkinghorne murder trial: Pauline Hanna planned to see a lawyer and write a will before her death, friend tells court https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-was-confronted-at-work-about-aggressive-behaviour-before-wife-pauline-hannas-death-colleague/4QXKUQYF75DT3MRZ2HZXSLGC2Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-was-confronted-at-work-about-aggressive-behaviour-before-wife-pauline-hannas-death-colleague/4QXKUQYF75DT3MRZ2HZXSLGC2Q/ Craig KapitanThe eye surgeon is accused of murdering his wife then staging a suicide. Wed, 14 Aug 2024 07:46:35 +0000 Eye surgeon Philip Polkinghorne, 71, stands in the High Court at Auckland dock as he pleads not guilty to murder at the outset of his trial. He is accused of having strangled wife Pauline Hanna then staging the death to look like a suicide. Photo / Michael Craig

Wed, 14 Aug 2024 07:08:29 +0000 Roadworker Joji Bilo, 25, was killed in Wellington’s Ngauranga Gorge in March 2019 after being fatally struck by a runaway truck.
Volunteer firefighter Peter Wayne Ferguson most likely died after falling asleep at the wheel https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/volunteer-firefighter-peter-wayne-ferguson-most-likely-died-after-falling-asleep-at-the-wheel/TIEH2ZB7K5DN5DMD3IDDBAWBVE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/volunteer-firefighter-peter-wayne-ferguson-most-likely-died-after-falling-asleep-at-the-wheel/TIEH2ZB7K5DN5DMD3IDDBAWBVE/ Hannah BartlettA coroner believes Peter Wayne Ferguson crashed after falling asleep at the wheel. Wed, 14 Aug 2024 07:00:00 +0000 Wayne Ferguson, from Ranfurly, died in a two-car crash, with the coroner finding that driver fatigue was the likely cause. Photo / Supplied
Givealittle fundraiser for family of 5-year-old Khyzah, found dead on Gisborne farm, raises over $10,000 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/givealittle-fundraiser-for-family-of-5-year-old-khyzah-found-dead-on-gisborne-farm-raises-nearly-10000/T3YDSVRHDJFRPHOWBERDVTMPVM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/givealittle-fundraiser-for-family-of-5-year-old-khyzah-found-dead-on-gisborne-farm-raises-nearly-10000/T3YDSVRHDJFRPHOWBERDVTMPVM/ Benjamin Plummer, Neil Reid'The loss of this cherished boy has left a big hole in everyone’s hearts.' Wed, 14 Aug 2024 06:34:31 +0000 A Givealittle page set up in memoriam of 5-year-old Khyzah has raised over $10,000.

Photo / Supplied

Whare theft: Ngāti Te Paea building taken from Parakawau Rd in Ōhau, Levin https://www.nzherald.co.nz/horowhenua-chronicle/news/ware-theft-ngati-te-paea-building-taken-from-parakawau-rd-in-ohau-levin/PN6CNWXK7JBUZALZOCHDQIUFEQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/horowhenua-chronicle/news/ware-theft-ngati-te-paea-building-taken-from-parakawau-rd-in-ohau-levin/PN6CNWXK7JBUZALZOCHDQIUFEQ/ Alyssa SmithThe building was used for tangi, hui and other events for the community and hapū. Wed, 14 Aug 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Ngāti Te Paea hapū member Tony Ireland said the theft of the whare has left iwi feeling devastated. Ireland is pictured here holding the "Te Whare o Te Paea" sign created for the whare. Photo / Grace Odlum
